item.title: [2x2] Dockside Extortionist
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Pirate

When Dockside Extortionist enters the battlefield, create X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments your opponents control. (Treasure tokens are artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Storm Fleet Pyromancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate Wizard

Raid — When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Rift Bolt
item.description:
Sorcery

Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Pirate's Pillage
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Annoyed Altisaur
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

Reach, trample

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Experiment One
item.description:
Creature — Human Ooze

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Elvish Rejuvenator
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Brindle Shoat
item.description:
Creature — Boar

When Brindle Shoat dies, create a 3/3 green Boar creature token.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Bloom Tender
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

item.title: [2x2] Rampant Growth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [2x2] Gnarlback Rhino
item.description:
Creature — Rhino

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Whenever you cast a spell that targets Gnarlback Rhino, draw a card.

item.title: [2x2] Thrive
item.description:
Sorcery

Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

item.title: [2x2] Webweaver Changeling
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

Reach

When Webweaver Changeling enters the battlefield, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, you gain 5 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Tuskguard Captain
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Bloodwater Entity
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

When Bloodwater Entity enters the battlefield, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Cartel Aristocrat
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Dreg Mangler
item.description:
Creature — Plant Zombie

Haste

Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Chronicler of Heroes
item.description:
Creature — Centaur Wizard

When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [2x2] Phyrexian Tyranny
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a player draws a card, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.

item.title: [2x2] Fireblade Artist
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

Haste

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, Fireblade Artist deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Mana Vault
item.description:
Artifact

Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault.

At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.

{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Sensei's Divining Top
item.description:
Artifact

{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022

item.title: [2x2] Cryptic Spires
item.description:
Land

As you create your deck, circle two of the colors below.

Cryptic Spires enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of either of the circled colors.

item.title: [2x2] Teferi's Protection
item.description:
Instant

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)

Exile Teferi's Protection.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/double-masters-2022-variants

item.title: [2x2] Liliana, the Last Hope
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Liliana

+1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-1 until your next turn.

−2: Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of Zombies you control."

item.title: [2x2] Wrenn and Six
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Wrenn

+1: Return up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

−1: Wrenn and Six deals 1 damage to any target.

−7: You get an emblem with "Instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have retrace." (You may cast instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.)

item.title: [2x2] Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Eldrazi

When you cast this spell, draw four cards.

Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)

When Kozilek, Butcher of Truth is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.
